vision.notes: Possess four membranous wings, suggesting visual capabilities for flight and navigation. Further research would be needed to provide specifics on visual acuity or color perception.

chemoreception.notes: Elongated faces terminate with mouthparts that are used to feed on dead and dying insects, nectar, and rotting fruit, suggesting a reliance on chemoreception to locate food sources.

mechanoreception.notes: Threadlike antennae likely function in mechanoreception, detecting air currents and nearby objects. Further research would be needed to provide specifics on antennal sensory capabilities.
